text: morning and lunch time not crowded. spacious. staff prepare food fast. got radio class 95. old school music. from many reviews avoid dinner time. now is 24hrs.

Closing hours at 10:30pm, but at 8:45pm this aunty with glasses start packing up chairs sweeping floor with customers still around, dragging chairs everywhere, sweeping dust up when people eating, very very annoying. Management should really look into it. Whats the point of stating 10:30 when at 9pm all the chairs already packed up and blocking the enterance, people will think its closed and it ruins the experience of people eating there. This way, they are paying for labour when no one comes in thinking its closed. I got my food pretty fast though unlike other review

Hi. Went to this KFC outlet today , purchased the porridge meal n American twister meal my all time favourite. All this while the taste is always consistent. Service also not bad. Keep this good momentum going.. I sure will patron often the next few years to come. Kudos ..

Staff at the cashier was very welcoming, even though it was night time and was low on customers at the time I came.

Food was up to standard, and I chose the wrong type of chicken, and he was quick to assist so that I could change it to what I wanted. However, the samyang double down burger, was a bit cold hence a little tough which may be due to it, possibly, being reheated a couple of times. Which we could tell from the taste.

Other than that, we were really craving KFC and was so glad that this outlet was open 24 hours. Just wished there was an outlet neare to us, in Woodlands, that was 24 hours.
Breakfast always my choice.  Food fresh and delicious and I avoid come dinner time. Store very clean. Keep it up. üëçüèª
